thread_replies.text:
Permanent Edition

#HokutoMatsumura (#SixTONES), who achieved the historic first Triple Crown. To commemorate this, we're delivering an expanded edition of this month's ADULT category!

▼Special Feature "Hokkun and National Treasure-Level Handsome Guy History"
